channel.title: CVE Feed for Control de Ciber -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Control de Ciber -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-48474|2024-09-26T14:14:54.831Z -- control%20de%20ciber -- control%20de%20ciber
item.description: Control de Ciber, in its 1.650 version, is affected by a Denial of Service condition through the version function. Sending a malicious request could cause the server to check if an unrecognized component is up to date, causing a memory failure error that shuts down the process.

item.title: CVE-2022-4896|2024-09-26T14:16:42.964Z -- control%20de%20ciber -- control%20de%20ciber
item.description: Cyber Control, in its 1.650 version, is affected by a vulnerabilityÂ in the generation on the server of pop-up windows with the messages "PNTMEDIDAS", "PEDIR", "HAYDISCOA" or "SPOOLER". A complete denial of service can be achieved by sending multiple requests simultaneously on a core.

item.title: CVE-2022-48475|2024-09-26T14:14:22.455Z -- control%20de%20ciber -- control%20de%20ciber
item.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Control de Ciber version 1.650, in the printing function. Sending a modified request by the attacker could cause a Buffer Overflow when the adminitrator tries to accept or delete the print query created by the request.
